channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- Salt
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- Salt

item.title: CVE-2023-20897|2023-09-05T10:56:33.183Z -- n%2Fa -- salt
item.description: Salt masters prior to 3005.2 or 3006.2 contain a DOS in minion return. After receiving several bad packets on the request server equal to the number of worker threads, the master will become unresponsive to return requests until restarted.

item.title: CVE-2023-20898|2023-09-05T10:59:10.439Z -- n%2Fa -- salt
item.description: Git Providers can read from the wrong environment because they get the same cache directory base name in Salt masters prior to 3005.2 or 3006.2. Anything that uses Git Providers with different environments can get garbage data or the wrong data, which can lead to wrongful data disclosure, wrongful executions, data corruption and/or crash.
